description: A signing profile is a signing template that can be used to carry out a pre-defined signing job.

PlatformId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AWSLambda-SHA384-ECDSA | Notation-OCI-SHA384-ECDSA  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-(cn|gov))?:[a-z-]+:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9])?:([0-9]{12})?:[^.]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ProfileVersion.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{10}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DAYS | MONTHS | YEARS  
Update requires: No interruption

SignatureValidityPeriod.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 127  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SignatureValidityPeriod.description: Signature validity period of the profile.
SignatureValidityPeriod.markdownDescription:
Signature validity period of the profile.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

PlatformId.description: The ID of the target signing platform.
PlatformId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the target signing platform.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: A list of tags associated with the signing profile.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of tags associated with the signing profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ProfileName.description: A name for the signing profile. AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the signing profile name.
ProfileName.markdownDescription:
A name for the signing profile. AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the signing profile name. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ProfileVersion.description: A version for the signing profile. AWS Signer generates a unique version for each profile of the same profile name.
ProfileVersion.markdownDescription:
A version for the signing profile. AWS Signer generates a unique version for each profile of the same profile name.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

ProfileVersionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile version.
ProfileVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified signing profile version.

Update requires: No interruption
